sentences.sentence: Results There were 8 cases proved by laparotomy, and 1 case by autopsy.
sentences.translation: 结果经剖腹探查确诊8例，尸解确诊1例。

sentences.sentence: Of public facilities, 54.5% could not perform laparotomy and 58.3% could not repair a hernia.
sentences.translation: 公共机构中，54.5%不能进行剖腹手术，58.3%不能修复疝气。

sentences.sentence: How many mother has eight to nine months of pregnancy, but also by others alive laparotomy!
sentences.translation: 我们有多少妈妈，已经怀孕八九个月了，还要被人家活活的剖腹！
